Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: 'Gray Raven? The name seems to have appeared in the information I just uploaded... forget it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heisen', 3: "It doesn't matter what it is if I can do my research.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: 'I study biochemistry, so I could tell it the moment you showed up. You are not living organisms, except for that one, right?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: "Mechanoid... not the most interesting research field for me, but the thought of carrying out research that I haven't been able to do for a long time made me excited!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heisen', 3: 'The white-haired lady over there, could you open your head for me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '...Are you seriously thinking about opening your head?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: 'Ah, is it a non-removable part? Biological self-healing, proliferation, division, none of them can be done? What a bummer...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: "Where's my scalpel? Oh wait, what are the tools for surgical operations now, the chainsaw, drill, or the harvester?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Calm down and think about it, she couldn't possibly touch anything right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heisen', 3: "As the data says, this is how I'm like...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heisen', 3: "I can't do experiments or pick up scalpels and dispensers anymore...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv, she just tried to cut your head open.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: 'Can I have one of those mechanical bodies like yours?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Heisen', 3: "The shape doesn't matter, as long as I can pick up a harvester, chainsaw, or drill. If not, a scalpel or dispenser will do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're facing severe problems in terms of technical aspects, application approval or follow-ups.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... could you please assist us as tactical memory?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Your experience data is quite valuable for us...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Heisen', 3: "Since my lovely subject asked, I'll agree to it. But...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Forget it, she won't open her head for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Memory: Heisen. Test passed and recycle completed.', 4: '1'}
